Why SolarCodex?

THE PROBLEM

The result? Wasted time, missed opportunities, and products that don't resonate with users.

Case Studies

Real-world examples of how we've helped businesses transform ideas into impact

1 / 4

üè• Therapy Management System

Confidential healthcare startup with manual therapy booking and management workflows

Problem üò∞

Therapists spending 15 minutes per booking, manual processes causing errors and inefficiencies

Solution ‚ú®

8-week strategic discovery process using Double Loop Learning, Business Model Canvas, and User Journey Mapping

Impact üéØ
  • Reduced booking time from 15 minutes to 2 minutes (87% faster)
  • Launched MVP in 6 weeks post-discovery
  • 85% therapist satisfaction in early testing
